## Description
Refactor PaymentAdapterFactory to support dependency injection with mocks

## Reason for Delegation
Task requires mocking dependencies across 4+ files in backend/src/payment directory, involving factory pattern, dependency injection, and test fixtures. Touches more than 5 files and over 400 LOC, requiring coordinated changes across PaymentAdapterFactory, StripeProcessor, and related test files.
